Package com.jmill29.tvtrackerapi.dao

Class ShowDaoImpl

java.lang.Object
com.jmill29.tvtrackerapi.dao.ShowDaoImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ShowDao
@Repository public class ShowDaoImpl extends Object implements ShowDao
JDBC-based implementation of the ShowDao interface for managing TV show records in the database.

Provides methods for CRUD operations and searching shows by various criteria using direct JDBC queries.

    • findById

      public Optional<Show> findById(int id) throws SQLException
      Finds a show by its unique ID.

      This method queries the database for a show with the specified unique identifier.

      Specified by:
      findById in interface ShowDao
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the show
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the Show if found, or empty if not found
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • findAll

      public List<Show> findAll() throws SQLException
      Retrieves all shows from the database.

      Returns a complete list of all shows stored in the system.

      Specified by:
      findAll in interface ShowDao
      Returns:
      a List of all Show records
      Throws:

    • findByName

      public List<Show> findByName(String name) throws SQLException
      Finds shows by their name (case-insensitive, partial match).

      This method performs a partial match search that may return multiple results containing the given name, using case-insensitive comparison.

      Specified by:
      findByName in interface ShowDao
      Parameters:
      name - the name or substring of the show to search for
      Returns:
      a List of Show objects with names containing the given substring
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • findByGenre

      public List<Show> findByGenre(String genre) throws SQLException
      Finds shows by their genre (exact match).

      Returns all shows that belong to the specified genre using an exact match search.

      Specified by:
      findByGenre in interface ShowDao
      Parameters:
      genre - the genre to search for (must match exactly)
      Returns:
      a List of Show objects in the specified genre
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • save

      public boolean save(Show show) throws SQLException, ShowAlreadyExistsException, ShowNotFoundException
      Saves a Show to the database.

      If the showId of the given show is 0, it is treated as a new show and will be inserted into the database. If the showId is non-zero, it is assumed the show already exists and an update operation will be performed instead.

      Specified by:
      save in interface ShowDao
      Parameters:
      show - the Show object to insert or update
      Returns:
      true if the operation was successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs
      ShowAlreadyExistsException
      ShowNotFoundException

    • deleteById

      public boolean deleteById(int id) throws SQLException
      Deletes a show by its unique ID.

      Attempts to remove the show with the specified ID from the database.

      Specified by:
      deleteById in interface ShowDao
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the show to delete
      Returns:
      true if the show was deleted successfully, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs
